title: Two arrested stemming from Clewiston homicide
content:
Hendry County deputies arrested two men they believe were involved in a homicide the Tuesday before Thanksgiving.
Gerald Tyrone Edwards, 26, and 27-year-old Winston Trotman have been arrested following the death of Anthony Holder, a 28-year-old who was gunned down in the Harlem Gardens community of Clewiston.
Neither of the men have been charged with Holder's death. Both are being held in the Hendry County Jail on charges of committing an act that could cause a death.
Holder was found by deputies lying on the ground. They attempted CPR but were unable to save Holder. Four others were injured in nearby shootings.
Investigators are still working the case and ask anyone with information to contact them at 863-674-5600 or Crime Stoppers at 1-800-780-8477 where callers are eligible for a cash reward of up to $1,000.
